formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'URIENCODE' =-
[Syntax] URIENCODE(<data>)
[Synopsis] Encodes a string to URI-safe encoding according to RFC 2396.
[Description] Not available

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ URIENCODE(<data>)
[Synopsis] - Encodes a string to URI-safe encoding. + Encodes a string to URI-safe encoding according to RFC 2396.
[Description] Not available
